org.apache.bcel.classfile
Class LineNumberTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.bcel.classfile.Attribute
        |
        +--org.apache.bcel.classfile.LineNumberTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Node, java.io.Serializable
public final class LineNumberTable
extends Attribute

This class represents a table of line numbers for debugging purposes. This attribute is used by the Code attribute. It contains pairs of PCs and line numbers.

Version:
$Id: LineNumberTable.html,v 1.1.1.1 2006/05/19 19:16:50 billf Exp $
Author:
M. Dahm
See Also:
Code, LineNumber, Serialized Form
